column4: can someone help me retrieve files from a hard drive using ubuntu live cd?
os on the hd is fedora 3
run the Ubuntu Live CD and mount the disk and copy the files to an other harddisk :)

you dont install anything just run the live session :)

cant you mount the disk ?

does that list the disk ?

try "sudo mount -a"
